fields.name: Casual Leave
fields.description: Casual leave for personal reasons, short-term absences, and emergencies.

fields.name: Sick Leave
fields.description: Sick leave for health-related absences. Medical certificate may be required for extended periods.

fields.name: Earned Leave
fields.description: Earned leave accrued over time. Can be used for vacations and planned time off.

fields.name: Leave Without Pay
fields.description: Leave without pay for situations where other leave balances are exhausted.
